mapper.select: SELECT id FROM ${tablePrefix}code_activity WHERE scene = #{scene} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tablePrefix}code_activity WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT id, name, scene FROM ${tablePrefix}code_activity WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT vca.id, vca.name, vca.scene, vca.created_at, vca.updated_at, #{appId} AS appId, vu.nick_name AS creator, vu2.nick_name AS updater FROM ${tablePrefix}code_activity vca LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}user vu ON vca.created_by = vu.id LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}user vu2 ON vca.updated_by = vu2.id WHERE vca.is_deleted = 0
AND vca.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY vca.id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tablePrefix}code_activity vca JOIN ${tablePrefix}wechat_mp_qrcode vwmq ON vwmq.scene = vca.scene AND vwmq.app_id = #{appId} WHERE vca.id = #{id} AND vca.is_deleted = 0
